subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sean Avery’s debut as a Ranger after being traded from the Kings gave the team an instant injection of spunk, but is it enough for a team that has slid to 11th place in the Eastern Conference?
snippet: Sean Avery’s debut as a Ranger after being traded from the Kings gave the team an instant injection of spunk, but is it enough for a team that has slid to 11th place in the Eastern Conference?
